Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Huh?!<sp:5:0:0> So the sludge disappeared thanks
to Prince Sidon...<sp:5:0:0>and what's more, he has
ascended the throne?!
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Wow!


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Thank you so much for letting me know!<sp:5:1:0>
I owe you a token of gratitude.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aha! I know just the thing!<sp:5:0:0> I would like for
you to have this <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Like the other weapons, it fell to decay
during the Upheaval. Still...<sp:5:0:0>it is not
completely without use.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>What is this?<sp:5:0:0> You have too many
weapons at the moment.

If you can make some space, I will gladly
hand over this <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aha! I know just the thing!<sp:5:0:0> I would like
you to have this <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Just like the other weapons, this fell to

talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Ahem, you still have too many weapons,
I am afraid.<sp:5:1:0> I see your passion for
collecting has not waned, hm?
When you have made some space, I will
gladly hand over this <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>!
talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You came back!<sp:5:0:0> Wonderful. Let us try
this again.
talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Here. This <clr:0000>Zora spear <clr:ffff>is yours now!<sp:5:0:0>


Just like the other weapons, this fell to
decay during the Upheaval. Still...<sp:5:0:0>it is not
completely without use.
talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Tired>You came back!<sp:5:0:0> You must allow me to
thank you.
talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Ah, you still have too many weapons.<sp:5:1:0>
You must enjoy collecting things, hm?

When you have made some space, I will
hand over this <clr:0000>Zora spear<clr:ffff>!
talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease_01>Thank you for saving me!<sp:5:0:0> Here, this
<clr:0000>Zora spear <clr:ffff>is yours now.

Just like the other weapons, this fell to
decay during the Upheaval. Still...<sp:5:0:0>it is not
completely without use.
Talk_01:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>The sludge is gone!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400>I was covered in sludge and my gills were
filling up fast.<sp:5:0:0> I thought it was all over for
me. <sp:5:0:0>But then, all of a sudden...<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Well, I am not sure precisely what
transpired, but one thing is certain.
I am saved!
